blogPost.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
blogPost.body: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
blogPost.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
blogPost.author: Wojtek Smajda

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.description: PowerFarm平臺可以讓您在雲端運行和協調Selenium和移動測試。它可以快速、徹底地監控結果，並確保與存儲庫或其他平臺順利集成。通過加入我們的早期訪問計劃瞭解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在雲端協調和管理您的測試。

previous.excerpt: Coverr is a resource for beautiful free and exclusive stock videos for commercial and non-commercial use, no attribution required. This should be your go-to destination when searching a video for your next project.
previous.title: Coverr 3.0 - Free stock videos for creators. No attribution required.

localize.description: Coverr是一个美丽的免费和独家的库存视频资源，用于商业和非商业用途，不需要注明来源。当您为您的下一个项目搜索视频时，这里应该是您的首选之地。
localize.tagline: 免费库存视频为创作者。无需归属。

localize.description: Coverr是一個美麗的免費和獨家的庫存視頻資源，用於商業和非商業用途，不需要註明來源。當您爲您的下一個項目搜索視頻時，這裏應該是您的首選之地。
localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。

next.excerpt: The way we build and use products is changing faster than ever before. To succeed, it’s essential to know what’s coming next. We surveyed thousands of Product leaders to distill the most important trends and insights you need to know as we enter 2021. Enjoy!
next.title: Future of Product Management Report 2021 - This is the best time in history to build digital products🚀

localize.description: 我们构建和使用产品的方式比以往任何时候都要快。要想获得成功，就必须了解下一步的发展方向。我们调查了数千名产品领导者，提炼出进入2021年后您需要了解的最重要趋势和见解。请欣赏
localize.tagline: 这是历史上打造数字产品的最好时机🚀。
